title: Russian attacks on Ukraine energy sites 'particularly depraved', UK PM Starmer says
summary: The UK leader's comments came after Russia renewed its attacks on power plants and critical infrastructure in Ukraine.

title: Andrew moves out of Royal Lodge home in Windsor
summary: The former prince's move to a temporary property on the Sandringham Estate follows the latest disclosure of Jeffrey Epstein files.

title: Melinda French Gates says ex-husband Bill has questions to answer over Epstein
summary: She said her ex-husband and others named in the Epstein files needed to answer whatever questions remain.
